definitions.definition: ( dated outside UK ) A learner at a school under the supervision of a teacher .
One who studies under supervision of a renowned expert in their field.
examples: Plato was Socrates' pupil , and in turn Aristotle was Plato's pupil .

definitions.definition: ( law , obsolete ) An orphan who is a minor and under the protection of the state.

main_definition: ( dated outside UK ) A learner at a school under the supervision of a teacher .
secondary_definitions: One who studies under supervision of a renowned expert in their field.
( law , obsolete ) An orphan who is a minor and under the protection of the state.

definitions.definition: The hole in the middle of the iris of the eye , through which light passes to be focused on the retina .
The central dark part of an ocellated spot .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The hole in the middle of the iris of the eye , through which light passes to be focused on the retina .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) The central dark part of an ocellated spot .
